title: Christmas Tree Day!
detail_text: <:th_ch0210/>I think it’s about time we start decorating the tree.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah, let’s go over it with everyone.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Speaking of which, what’s Christmas like in Switzerland?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>It’s a big event in Switzerland. My family starts it by going fir tree hunting~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eeeh!? Fir tree hunting!? Umm, you don’t mean like.... going to the department store, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah, we would go to the forest. We would bring our entire family, complete with lunch and everything, to try and find a good fir tree.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I think that would classify it as more than a “big event”.... But that does sound like a lot of fun.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, it’s like a semi-winter picnic, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I would love to experience finding a tree by ourselves too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I also want everyone to have a taste of Swiss Christmas~. I’ll invite you guys over someday, alright?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
